header.title: Syntax Highlighter 3 mod
header.description: a small mod that allows the styling of code using a custom bbcode.
header.author-notes:
once the mod is installed you need to add a new bbcode USAGE [code2={SIMPLETEXT}]{TEXT}[/code2] HTML Replace 
{TEXT}
HELPLINE you need to specify a language for each calling of the bbcode by doing this code=html or code=php so when you call the bbcode you will get this [code2=]some code[/code2] what you do is put your codes between the tags then tell it what type of code is there by doing this [code2=html]some code[/code2] The Brushes are dynamically loaded according to what is called through the bbcodes. all files included use the MIT / GPL v2 license
